Philippines, Vietnam to sign coastguard deal risking China's ireThe Philippines and Vietnam will agree to boost coastguard cooperation during a visit to Hanoi next week by Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, officials said, a move that risks angering China. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 10:42:14 GMT标签TSLK5XFK5JOQCK3LXKEDV2E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-vietnam-sign-coastguard-deal-risking-chinas-ire-2024-01-25/Karen Lema, Francesco Guarascio世界亚太地区
The key people in Israel's governmentMore than three months into the war in Gaza, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is being challenged by members of his own war cabinet about strategy, pressured by Washington over post-war Gaza plans and hemmed in by his far-right ministers. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 10:40:08 GMT 3YYZG3CYEBNDVAMOS36DK27XM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/key-people-israels-government-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
Israeli tanks batter hospital districts in Gaza's Khan YounisIsraeli forces relentlessly bombarded areas around two hospitals in Gaza's main southern city Khan Younis on Thursday, pinning down large numbers of displaced people, residents said, in an offensive to take Hamas' main stronghold in the enclave's south. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 10:36:25 GMT BI5ANB4475OMPMFQBUFR4PGBJM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-tanks-batter-hospital-districts-gazas-khan-younis-2024-01-25/Fadi Shana, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Dan Williams世界中东
Myanmar ex-leader Suu Kyi's house arrest site worth at least $90mln - courtA court in military-run Myanmar has put up for auction the villa where ex-leader and democracy icon Aung San Suu Kyi spent 15 years under house arrest, and set starting bids at 315 billion kyats ($90 million), a source said on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 10:28:29 GMT YLUMDEXJNFNSFNBIE5YVEZE7SQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-ex-leader-suu-kyis-house-arrest-site-worth-least-90mln-court-2024-01-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukraine calls for international probe into downing of Russian military planeUkraine will do everything possible to secure an international investigation into the downing of a Russian military transport plane, the country's ombudsman said on Thursday, a day after Moscow accused Kyiv of deliberately shooting it down. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 10:07:55 GMT Q74BYEDITZKNRFVY6R74S76PXI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-calls-international-probe-into-downing- Russian-military-plane-2024-01-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: Ukraine to start building 4 new nuclear reactors this yearUkraine expects to start construction work on four new nuclear power reactors this summer or autumn, Energy Minister German Galushchenko told Reuters on Thursday, as the country seeks to compensate for lost energy capacity due to the war with Russia. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 10:04:22 GMT X6NTONCICRJE5KUMX3LXQYF3OU https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/ukraine-start-building-4-new-nuclear-reactors-this-year-minister-2024-01-25/Pavel Polityuk商业活力
Ukrainian drones hit Rosneft refinery in Russia - sourceUkrainian drones attacked a Rosneft-owned oil refinery in southern Russia in the latest such strike on Russian energy infrastructure, a Ukrainian source said on Thursday. Revellers who fled Hamas reunite with Holocaust survivor who sheltered themAs a child, Sarah Jackson survived the Nazi Holocaust. On Oct. 7 last year, she found herself sheltering three Israelis fleeing the deadliest attack on Jews since World War Two. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 09:49:00 GMT UA7VLHXDUBJ5VCH32UNDRDWLT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/revellers-who-fled-hamas-reunite-with-holocaust-survivor-who-sheltered-them-2024-01-25/Rami Amichay世界中东
UK must comply with human rights court, president saysThe president of Europe's human rights court said on Thursday Britain had a legal obligation to comply with its injunctions after Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said he would ignore such orders over his plan to send some asylum seekers to Rwanda. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 09:32:20 GMT 2VSR4B72DNOTXE22QDFOGUYC7I https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-must-comply-with- human-rights-court-orders-president-says-2024-01-25/Michael Holden世界英国
China slams US 'provocation' in Taiwan Strait, pledges further drillsChina criticised the United States on Thursday for causing "trouble and provocation" after the U.S. Navy sailed its first warship through the sensitive Taiwan Strait since presidential and parliamentary elections on the island. UN opened Russian bank account to enable climate payments amid sanctionsThe United Nations said it opened a Russian bank account in 2022 as Western sanctions complicated the use of normal payment channels and has received membership fees from three Russian banks to a U.N. climate funding programme since then.
